In the case of lower shipping costs (Especially within BC where the shipping costs are almost negligible), the difference will be reimbursed to your account the same day the item ships. In the case of higher shipping costs, well, if it's a reasonable amount of difference we will pay the extra. If the amount isn't reasonable say, fifteen or twenty dollars more on a low cost item, we will email you before shipping to make sure you still want the product, and ask that you pay the difference before we ship. Fair? We think so.

name: ALM - SKRATCHER
description:
The official event merchandise of Skratcher. Skratcher is created to share and inspire existing and upcoming Turntable enthusiasts. Skratcher was formed to allow people to explore the art and beauty of Turntablism as a community. Bringing the “Bedroom DJ” out to the open and given a chance to share his/her musical expressions. Skratcher is a ALL AGES event, inviting Turntablists of the future.
